sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Recipe } from '../recipe.model' @Component({ selector: 'app-recipe-list', templateUrl: './recipe-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./recipe-list.component.css'] }) export class RecipeListComponent { recipes: Recipe[] = [ new Recipe('Spaghetti', 'Crush some tomatoes and add pasta!', 'https://images.immediate.co.uk/production/volatile/sites/30/2018/07/RedPepperAnchovySpaghetti-copy-1dec261.jpg?quality=90&webp=true&resize=300,272') ]; }
New Recipe

Recipe name: {{recipe.name}}

Description: {{recipe.description}}
